document_data.name: From the Fields
document_data.mainbody: The so-called '''From the Fields''' was one of the more notable dishes from the city of [[Velen]] in the nation of [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Description: From the Fields was the name given to [[rice]] softcakes, cooked to a crispy crust, then rolled in mashed [[potato]]s, [[onion]], and [[egg]]s, and served with chopped greens of a wild spicy onion.
document_data.History: As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], From the Fields could be found on [[Blackthorn's Brew]]'s menu, a [[festhall]] on the [[Captain's Cliff]] in Velen. The dish was mentioned among other notable foods included in [[Volothamp Geddarm]]'s published guide to [[Amn]] and Tethyr.
